title: The Sims 3 - Complete Collection All sp+ep 2014 repack Mr DJ
description:
The Sims 3 Complete Collection All stuffpacks+expansionpacks Repack by Mr DJ (Me)

Repack features:
 - Interface languages is English (All languages present) ;
 - Final game version: 1.67.2 (latest);
 - Precracked - install and play(No origin or other bullshit required);
 - Install Time - 30 minutes [Quad core]
 - Final Size: 22.6gb + 8gb for store updates and worlds
 - Registry: Yes
 - Operating System: Win Xp,Win Vista,Win 7,Win 8,Win 8.1 (both 32bit and 64bit)

 Contents Included :

 The Sims 3 Base Game 
 The Sims 3: World Adventures
 The Sims 3: High-End Loft Stuff
 The Sims 3: Ambitions
 The Sims 3: Fast Lane Stuff
 The Sims 3: Late Night
 The Sims 3: Outdoor Living Stuff
 The Sims 3: Generations
 The Sims 3: Town Life Stuff
 The Sims 3: Pets
 The Sims 3: Master Suite
 The Sims 3: Showtime
 The Sims 3: Katy Perry's Sweet Treats Stuff
 The Sims 3: Diesel Stuff
 The Sims 3: Supernatural
 The Sims 3: Seasons
 The Sims 3: 70's, 80's & 90's Stuff
 The Sims 3: University Life
 The Sims 3: Island Paradise
 The Sims 3: Movie Stuff
 The Sims 3: Into the Future

Store updates upto 1 to 26 as of July 2011 has been included as separate package install fles, if you want to install (easy install guide has been provided)...
You can easily add all other store updates or custom content as the game is up to date...
Five other Sims World are also provided as a separate install....
Both of Store updates and Worlds are provided in 'Store And Worlds' folder....

The Sims 3 Worlds included(you can add more):

 1. Appaloosa Plains
 2. Bridgeport
 3. Isla Paradiso
 4. Moonlight Falls
 5. Starlight Shores
 6. Sunset Valley 
 7. Twinbrook
 8. Barnacle Bay (separate package install)
 9. Lucky palms (separate package install)
 10.Riverview (separate package install)
 11.Sunlit tides (separate package install)
 12.Dragon Valley (separate package install)

Yes the Dragon eggs hatches! I have fixed the dragon valley glitch,fix instruction has been included.......

**INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

DISABLE UR ANTIVIRUS BEFORE RUNNING SETUP (IMPORTANT) ,, same for uninstall.....(For avast users: Disable DeepScreen in antivirus settings)...Setup requires latest 'Dotnetframe' to run(provided in 'Redist' folder),for Xp users if setup crashes,download and install the compatible 'Dotnetframe' from microsoft...

Before running setup of this repack, make sure u have uninstalled your every Sims 3 game, if any on your system, make sure there is no 'Electronic Arts' folder in your 'Documents'('My Documents' for xp users) folder after uninstalling your previous Sims 3 game as 'Electronic Arts' contains 'The Sims 3' folder consisting of cache and mods of your previous game which could lead to crashing of the game....This folder will be regenerated for this repack after 1st time u run the game.......

NO MODS SHOULD BE PRESENT FOR THE FIRST TIME YOU RUN THE GAME, install them after the first time game has been played...

After running setup,, select the necessary software (direct x and visual c++ provided in Redist folder),, install as usual,,play the game from desktop shortcut....

For the first time when you open the game, the game will take some time in starting(black screen) please be patient, next time it'll launch quickly....

The game will always show 'Into The Future' loading screen as it is the latest expansion, everything is included in it......

First time you load each world, loading takes time, please be patient, It's like running 10 games at once(don't assume it has frozen) just wait & let it load.....

Please do check 'Performance guide' text file that i have provided to ensure for the best performance as the The Sims 3 has some problem in recognizing many new graphic cards (definitely if u r having some graphics glitches).........

Don't download any patches or updates from the game launcher....Apply manual update if any in the future.........

IF YOU LIKE THE REPACK,,GIVE FEEDBACK AND SEED.......

LIKE THE GAME,, BUY IT AND SUPPORT THE DEVELOPERS.......
